title: Roll The Dice
lyrics:
Oh, oh
Mince my words
Burn both ends
I've paid my tolls
(Paid my tolls)
Cardinal sins

Paved my roads

I'm on my own

(On my own)

Oh (Oh)



But every time I fall, I fall harder (Oh, babe)

And every time I sail, I breathe water (Ooh)



So let me roll the dice, babe

Let me spin the barrel, once or twice

Trust me with the cards, hey

Just let me take a bet out on this life



Gavels up, windows down

I've made my bed (Made my bed)

Oh, hang my bones in

Catacombs inside my head (Inside my head)

'Cause every time I stand up, I cower (Oh, oh)

And every time I speak, I lose power



So let me roll the dice, babe

Let me spin the barrel once or twice

Trust me with the cards, hey

Just let me take a bet out on this life

I don't wanna choose

And I don't wanna take my own advice

Leave it to the birds

And let me take a bet out on this life
